2011-06-27

Glastonbury 2011 from my sofa #1: Anna Calvi - Jezebel

I don't do festivals... I like my rock music indoors and in the dark so I can pretend I'm alone not in a huge field (or a tent) with loads of people who care more about the event than the music... I did, however, rather enjoy Glastonbury from the comfort of my living room... this is what I enjoyed:

Anna Calvi - Jezebel (this is the promo video not the Glastonbury perfromance which I haven't tracked down (in a sharable form)):

I remember seeing The Milkshakes perform Jezebel back in the early 80s and always had a soft sopt for the song:
